title: Is We Dumb? | Hugging. Brain Implant. Will Smith. Nipple Knuckles.
description:
Can you imagine being so disconnected with reality that you give your male dog to a local shelter because it humped another male dog? Yikes. Let's talk about that, having way too high of standards for hair loss shampoo, super long nipples, a crazy brain implant that allows you to communicate, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/WgYzDNfuAo8

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

All Merch Inquiries: store@badmagicproductions.com
